nav.subTitle: Discover the freedom on four wheels - rent dreams

carSlider.slogan1: Complete reservation criteria and travel without limits!
carSlider.slogan2: Rent the car of your dreams!

refund.ref: Return the car in a different location

premission.one: I declare that before concluding the agreement, I have read the Car Rental Ltd. Regulations for car rental, with its registered office in Warsaw (01-123), at 1 Okopowa Street. I understand and accept its content.
premission.two: I consent to the processing of my personal data. More information on the website www.car-rental.pl in the privacy policy section.

errors.nameSurname: Please provide a valid first name and last name.
errors.phoneNumber: Please provide a valid phone number (9 digits).
errors.email: Please provide a valid email address.
errors.streetNr: Street and house number are required.
errors.zipCode: Please provide a valid postal code (format XX-XXX).
errors.carAgreement: Accepting the terms and conditions is required.
errors.personalDataAgreement: Consent for data processing is required.
errors.valid: The form has been successfully submitted.

cookieDescription: This website uses cookies, tags, and similar technologies to offer users the best service level. In addition to the categories listed below, our site also uses essential cookies that ensure its functioning. More details can be found in our cookie policy. Below you can manage your preferences. By selecting CONFIRM, you agree to our use of cookies according to these preferences. To remember these preferences, we will use an appropriate cookie.

trafficAnalysis.title: Traffic Analysis
trafficAnalysis.description: These cookies are used to collect data on how users use our website.

adsAndProfiling.title: Advertising and Profiling
adsAndProfiling.description: These files allow us to tailor the advertisements you see on other sites.

optimization.title: Optimization
optimization.description: These cookies allow us to optimize your visit to the CAR-RENTAL.PL site and improve your experience.

findUs: Find us on the map and see where you can pick up your car!
